channel.title: Comments on: Wind Turbines Don’t Kill Birds Hunters Do – The record on bats is a little less clear

item.title: By: DougNic
item.dc:creator: DougNic
item.description:
a reader of this post sent this to me by email...i encouraged him to register and post this comment himself but he didn't seem to think it was worth the effort so here are his thoughts:
I don't know if you are ill informed or just a misty eyed believer or just a shyster?
Turbines do kill birds,,,protected birds and lots of them. Are you aware that the Altamont wind farm has been sued to shutdown 4 month of the year to prevent the killing of hundreds of PROTECTED Golden Eagles? They also kill the declining stock of burrowing owls, protected peregrine falcons, hawks in the thousands every year. Hunter kill birds that are allowed and are punished if they kill things they shouldn't. Please don't give me the tired logic of well birds die other ways. That is like saying people get murdered so I can go kill other people. Golden Eagles are protected and other industrial sources get punished if they harm them. You can go to jail for killing eagles. Wind Turbine need to be sited in smart location. Or don't you care as long as you get the money. I am currently fighting a 400 tall wind turbine being proposed for a National Park. Are you in favor of building over our National Parks.because your other cheerleading wind turbine enthusiasts are.that is after they cut down the tree for biomass burning.

a reader of this post sent this to me by email…i encouraged him to register and post this comment himself but he didn’t seem to think it was worth the effort so here are his thoughts:

I don’t know if you are ill informed or just a misty eyed believer or just a
shyster?

Turbines do kill birds,,,protected birds and lots of them. Are you aware
that the Altamont wind farm has been sued to shutdown 4 month of the year to
prevent the killing of hundreds of PROTECTED Golden Eagles? They also kill
the declining stock of burrowing owls, protected peregrine falcons, hawks in
the thousands every year. Hunter kill birds that are allowed and are
punished if they kill things they shouldn’t. Please don’t give me the tired

so I can go kill other people. Golden Eagles are protected and other

killing eagles. Wind Turbine need to be sited in smart location. Or don’t

wind turbine being proposed for a National Park. Are you in favor of
building over our National Parks.because your other cheerleading wind
turbine enthusiasts are.that is after they cut down the tree for biomass
burning.
